betterquesting:10.desc:8:
An arcane levitation table can consume aura to create a stream of air that propels the entity in the direction it is facing. You can control its on/off switch with a redstone signal. 

The default height of the airstream when first placed is 8 frames, and the levitation distance can be adjusted by clicking on the trigger at the bottom of the levitation table (as the distance increases, the magic consumption increases): 

4 frames (8vis/minute), 8 frames (16vis/minute), 16 frames (32vis/minute), 32 frames (64vis/minute) 

While there are creatures levitating it consumes 1 vis of magic power per second! . 

Can be used to make a brush tower.
